last_phrase: In conclusion, the symbolism of fire and purification is evident in various cultures and religions throughout history. The idea of passing through a ring of fire to gain immortality or entering paradise after being purified by fire is present in many ancient beliefs. The concept of apatheia, or immunity to passion, is also linked to the state of purity through the purification of the mind and soul. These ideas provide insight into the human desire for transcendence and the pursuit of the divine, which has been a constant theme throughout human history.
